skills.name: AGONY
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target, then to all enemies.
• 40% Chance to Lower DEF for 2 turns on the initial target.
• 40% Chance to Increase DEF for 2 turns on the initial target.
• Damage dealt increases the higher your DEF stat.

skills.name: DEVASTATE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to Ignite enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: IMPACT
desc: Raise ATK and DEF of all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
